name: flor
description: Command line user interface JavaScript toolkit

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run copy && echo 'build successful'
scripts.copy: rm -rf dist/src/blessed && cp -r src/blessed dist/src && cp -r usr dist
scripts.test-watch: npx watch  "npm run test-quick" src spec
scripts.test-quick-js: npm run clean && npm run build && node dist/spec/support/customJasmine.js spec/support/jasmine-quick-js.json && echo $?
scripts.lint: npm run organizeImports && npm run format && npm run tslint
scripts.docs-api-md: D=docs/api/md && rm -rf $D; mkdir $D ; npx typedoc --options typedoc.ts --theme markdown --out $D
scripts.all-test: npm run clean   && npm run build && npm test && npm run test-quick-js
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run lint &&  npm run build && npm run all-test
scripts.browserify: npm run build && browserify dist/spec/experiments/appTest1.js -o dist/bundle.js && cp spec/experiments/bundle.html dist && npx terser dist/bundle.js -o dist/bundle.js

author: Sebastian Gurin
